articles.description: The Delta variant is now 1,000 times more virulent than the original strain. It now makes up 80% of all COVID-19 cases nationwide.
articles.content:
WEST BEND The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is asking everyone to mask back-up, even if you are fully vaccinated.
Its because of the more contagious Delta variant.

articles.title: The 2021 summer COVID case surge is already worse than 2020’s. How is that possible? - fox8.com
articles.description: We have three vaccines on the market and 60% of adults fully vaccinated. So why are COVID-19 cases spiking higher than last summer? It comes down to three reasons, experts say.
articles.content:
(NEXSTAR) Last year, at the height of our summer surge, the U.S. saw an average 66,784 new COVID-19 cases per day, according to New York Times data.

articles.title: COVID Lambda variant shows vaccine resistance in lab - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: In a study from Singapore, researchers found that while Delta viral loads were similar in vaccinated and unvaccinated patients, the viral loads decreased faster in the vaccinated group.
articles.content:
